name: Rossignol XC-3 FW Boots - Women's
description: Versatile boots for recreational touring. They prioritize comfort and warmth while offering good mobility, stability, and control. The fixed-cuff design puts maximum energy into each kick, for a powerful classic technique.Ergonomic lace covers protect against cold and snow.Velcro® powerstrap fits snug to enhance mobility, stability, and control of your skis.Thinsulate® insulation provides impressive warmth for comfort even in fierce conditions.Speed-lock lacing system gets you into your skis and out in the snow faster.Quick-dry inner linings keep your feet comfortable all day.Active heel support provides lots of control.Toe-box, midsole and heel are reinforced for increased durability when exploring on and off-trail.Narrower female-specific fit offers good control and comfort.
